name: Casual Traffic
description:
- 40 Levels with Variety of Unique Challenges
- Each Gameplay Features Unique, Random Traffic Flow
- Fast Paced Gameplay
- Low Poly Graphic

Direct the flow of traffic in this simple traffic management game. Combine strategy and quick time decision making to ensure the safety of the drivers while traversing the level as quickly as possible. 40 Levels of traffic with unique landscape, challenges and situation, including accidents and roadworks awaits you.
